document_data.name: Rotten Root Tavern
document_data.mainbody: The '''Rotten Root Tavern''' was a dive on [[Silverpiece Way]] in [[Westgate]] that, as of [[1480 DR]], had been in business for over 100 years.
document_data.Activities: The establishment was best known for its bad food and drink and its sign depicting an evil-looking [[treant]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The bar was the favorite hangout of [[Kalen Dren]] when he was in Westgate.{{Cite digital book/Eye of Justice|1012}}
document_data.Location: The Rotten Root was located in the west section of the city on both Silverpiece Way and [[North Ssemm Spur]].
